019package org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n;
020
021import static java.lang.System.setProperty;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.STRING;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.ISO8859_1;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE_ENCODING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
032
033import java.util.MissingResourceException;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.ResourceBundle;
036
037import org.apiguardian.api.API;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
042
043/**
044 *  Utilities that are related to the i18n feature.
045 *
046 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
047 *  @version $Id: I18nUtil.java 934 2021-12-06 15:19:40Z tquadrat $
048 *  @since 0.1.0
049 *
050 *  @UMLGraph.link
051 */
052@UtilityClass
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: I18nUtil.java 934 2021-12-06 15:19:40Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
055public final class I18nUtil
056{
057        /*-----------*\
058    ====** Constants **========================================================
059        \*-----------*/
060    /**
061     *  The name for the file with the additional texts.
062     */
063    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
064    public static final String ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE = "AdditionalTexts.xml";
065
066    /**
067     *  The name of the annotation processor option that provides the location
068     *  for the file with the additional texts
069     *  ({@value org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil#ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE}):
070     *  {@value}.
071     */
072    public static final String ADDITIONAL_TEXT_LOCATION = "org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.ap.textLocation";
073
074    /**
075     *  The default name for the resource bundle: {@value}.
076     */
077    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
078    public static final String DEFAULT_BASEBUNDLENAME = "MessagesAndTexts";
079
080    /**
081     *  The default message prefix: {@value}.
082     */
083    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
084    public static final String DEFAULT_MESSAGE_PREFIX = "MSG";
085
086        /*--------------*\
087    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
088        \*--------------*/
089    /**
090     *  No instance allowed for this class.
091     */
092    private I18nUtil() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( I18nUtil.class ); }
093
094        /*---------*\
095    ====** Methods **==========================================================
096        \*---------*/
097    /**
098     *  <p>{@summary Composes a message key.}</p>
099     *  <p>The format for the key is like this</p>
100     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>message_prefix</i>&gt;-&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
101     *
102     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
103     *  @param  id  The message id.
104     *  @return The message key.
105     */
106    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
107    public static final String composeMessageKey( final String messagePrefix, final String id )
108    {
109        final var retValue = format( "%s-%s", requireNotEmptyArgument( messagePrefix, "messagePrefix" ), requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) );
110
111        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
112        return retValue;
113    }   //  composeMessageKey()
114
115    /**
116     *  <p>{@summary Composes a message key.}</p>
117     *  <p>The format for the key is like this</p>
118     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>message_prefix</i>&gt;-&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
119     *  <p>The id will be a six-digit number, prepended with zeroes if
120     *  required.</p>
121     *
122     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
123     *  @param  id  The message id.
124     *  @return The message key.
125     */
126    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
127    public static final String composeMessageKey( final String messagePrefix, final int id )
128    {
129        final var retValue = format( "%s-%06d", requireNotEmptyArgument( messagePrefix, "messagePrefix" ), id );
130
131        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
132        return retValue;
133    }   //  composeMessageKey()
134
135    /**
136     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for a text.}</p>
137     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
138     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.&lt;<i>use</i>&gt;_&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
139     *
140     *  @param  sourceClass The class where the text was defined.
141     *  @param  use The text use.
142     *  @param  id  The id for the text, as from
143     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text#id() &#64;Text.id}.
144     *  @return The text key.
145     */
146    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
147    public static final String composeTextKey( final Class<?> sourceClass, final TextUse use, final String id )
148    {
149        final var retValue = composeTextKey( requireNonNullArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" ).getName(), use, id );
150
151        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
152        return retValue;
153    }   //  composeTextKey()
154
155    /**
156     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for a text.}</p>
157     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
158     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.&lt;<i>use</i>&gt;_&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
159     *
160     *  @param  sourceClass The name of the class where the text was defined.
161     *  @param  use The text use.
162     *  @param  id  The id for the text, as from
163     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text#id() &#64;Text.id}.
164     *  @return The text key.
165     */
166    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
167    public static final String composeTextKey( final String sourceClass, final TextUse use, final String id )
168    {
169        final var retValue = format( "%s.%s_%s", requireNotEmptyArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" ), requireNonNullArgument( use, "use" ).name(), requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "name" ) );
170
171        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
172        return retValue;
173    }   //  composeTextKey()
174
175    /**
176     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for an <code>enum</code>
177     *  value.}</p>
178     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
179     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.STRING_&lt;<i>name</i>&gt;</code></pre>
180     *
181     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
182     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
183     *  @return The text key.
184     *
185     *  @see Enum#name()
186     */
187    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
188    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String composeTextKey( final E value )
189    {
190        final var sourceClass = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).getDeclaringClass();
191        final var id = value.name();
192        final var use = STRING;
193        final var retValue = composeTextKey( sourceClass, use, id );
194
195        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
196        return retValue;
197    }   //  composeTextKey()
198
199    /**
200     *  Creates the fallback text or message when the resource bundle does not
201     *  have a text for the given key.
202     *
203     *  @param  key The failed key.
204     *  @param  args    The arguments.
205     *  @return The fallback text.
206     */
207    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
208    public static final String createFallback( final String key, final Object... args )
209    {
210        final var retValue = format( "[%s] â %s", requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" ), Objects.toString( args ) );
211
212        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
213        return retValue;
214    }   //  createFallback()
215
216    /**
217     *  Loads the resource bundle with the given base bundle name. If there is
218     *  no resource bundle for the given base bundle name, the return value is
219     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}.
220     *
221     *  @param  baseBundleName  The base bundle name.
222     *  @return An instance of
223     *      {@link Optional}
224     *      that holds the resource bundle.
225     */
226    @SuppressWarnings( "AssignmentToNull" )
227    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
228    public static final Optional<ResourceBundle> loadResourceBundle( final String baseBundleName )
229    {
230        //---* Force the use of UTF-8 for the resource bundle files *----------
231        setProperty( PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE_ENCODING, ISO8859_1.name() );
232
233        ResourceBundle bundle;
234        try
235        {
236            final var bundleName = requireNotEmptyArgument( baseBundleName, "baseBundleName" );
237            bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle( bundleName );
238        }
239        catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final MissingResourceException e )
240        {
241            bundle = null;
242        }
243
244        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( bundle );
245
246        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
247        return retValue;
248    }   //  loadResourceBundle()
249
250    /**
251     *  Returns the message for the given key, or the alternative text.
252     *
253     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
254     *  @param  message The message.
255     *  @param  messageKey  The resource bundle key for the alternative
256     *      message.
257     *  @param  args    The argument for the alternative message.
258     *  @return The resolved message.
259     *
260     *  @deprecated Use
261     *      {@link #resolveText(Optional, String, String, Object...)}
262     *      instead.
263     */
264    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
265    @Deprecated( forRemoval = true, since = "0.0.2" )
266    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.2" )
267    public static final String resolveMessage( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final String message, final String messageKey, final Object... args )
268    {
269        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent() && isNotEmptyOrBlank( messageKey )
270            ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), messageKey, args )
271            : requireNotEmptyArgument( message, "message" );
272
273        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
274        return retValue;
275    }   //  resolveMessage()
276
277    /**
278     *  Returns the message for the given key, or the alternative text.
279     *
280     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
281     *  @param  message The message.
282     *  @param  messageKey  The resource bundle key for the alternative
283     *      message.
284     *  @param  args    The argument for the alternative message.
285     *  @return The resolved message.
286     *
287     *  @deprecated Use
288     *      {@link #resolveText(Optional, Optional, Optional, Object...)}
289     *      instead.
290     */
291    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
292    @Deprecated( forRemoval = true, since = "0.0.2" )
293    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.2" )
294    public static final String resolveMessage( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final Optional<String> message, final Optional<String> messageKey, final Object... args )
295    {
296        final var _message = requireNonNullArgument( message, "message" ).orElse( "[MissingMessage] â %s" );
297        final var _messageKey = requireNonNullArgument( messageKey, "messageKey" ).orElse( "MissingMessage" );
298        final var retValue = resolveMessage( bundle, _message, _messageKey, args );
299
300        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
301        return retValue;
302    }   //  resolveMessage()
303
304    /**
305     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given key, or the alternative
306     *  text.} This method is primarily used internally by the library, but can
307     *  be also useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
308     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
309     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
310     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
311     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, String, Object...)}
312     *  should be used instead.</p>
313     *
314     *  @note   <code>text</code> is used as is! The arguments will be applied
315     *      only to a text that will be retrieved from the resource bundle!
316     *
317     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
318     *  @param  text    The alternative text that is used if there is no
319     *      resource bundle, or that bundle does not contain a text for the
320     *      given key.
321     *  @param  textKey The resource bundle key for the text.
322     *  @param  args    The argument for the retrieved text.
323     *  @return The resolved text.
324     */
325    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
326    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
327    public static final String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final String text, final String textKey, final Object... args )
328    {
329        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent() && isNotEmptyOrBlank( textKey )
330            ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), textKey, args )
331            : requireNotEmptyArgument( text, "text" );
332
333        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
334        return retValue;
335    }   //  resolveText()
336
337    /**
338     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given key, or the alternative
339     *  text.} This method is primarily used internally by the library, but can
340     *  be also useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
341     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
342     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
343     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
344     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, String, Object...)}
345     *  should be used instead.</p>
346     *
347     *  @note   <code>text</code> is used as is! The arguments will be applied
348     *      only to a text that will be retrieved from the resource bundle!
349     *
350     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
351     *  @param  text    The alternative text that is used if there is no
352     *      resource bundle, or that bundle does not contain a text for the
353     *      given key.
354     *  @param  textKey The resource bundle key for the text.
355     *  @param  args    The argument for the retrieved text.
356     *  @return The resolved text.
357     */
358    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
359    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
360    public static final String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final Optional<String> text, final Optional<String> textKey, final Object... args )
361    {
362        final var _message = requireNonNullArgument( text, "text" ).orElse( createFallback( "MissingText", args ) );
363        final var _messageKey = requireNonNullArgument( textKey, "textKey" ).orElse( "MissingTextKey" );
364        final var retValue = resolveText( bundle, _message, _messageKey, args );
365
366        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
367        return retValue;
368    }   //  resolveText()
369
370    /**
371     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given {@code enum} value.} This
372     *  method is primarily used internally by the library, but can be also
373     *  useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
374     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
375     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
376     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
377     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, Enum)}
378     *  should be used instead.</p>
379     *
380     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
381     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
382     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
383     *  @return The resolved text.
384     */
385    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
386    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
387    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final E value )
388    {
389        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent()
390             ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), value )
391             : requireNotEmptyArgument( value, "value" ).name();
392
393        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
394        return retValue;
395    }   //  resolveText()
396
397    /**
398     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the message with the given key from the given
399     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
400     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a message for the given key,
401     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
402     *
403     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
404     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
405     *  @param  id  The id for the message.
406     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
407     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
408     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
409     *  @return The text.
410     */
411    public static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String messagePrefix, final int id, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
412    {
413        final var retValue = retrieveMessage( bundle, composeMessageKey( messagePrefix, id ), addKey, args );
414
415        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
416        return retValue;
417    }   //  retrieveMessage()
418
419    /**
420     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the message with the given key from the given
421     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
422     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a message for the given key,
423     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
424     *
425     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
426     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
427     *  @param  id  The id for the message.
428     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
429     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
430     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
431     *  @return The text.
432     *
433     *  @see Objects#toString(Object)
434     */
435    public static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String messagePrefix, final String id, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
436    {
437        final var retValue = retrieveMessage( bundle, composeMessageKey( messagePrefix, id ), addKey, args );
438
439        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
440        return retValue;
441    }   //  retrieveMessage()
442
443    /**
444     *  The internal implementation for
445     *  {@link #retrieveMessage(ResourceBundle, String, int, boolean, Object...)}
446     *  and
447     *  {@link #retrieveMessage(ResourceBundle, String, String, boolean, Object...)}.
448     *
449     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
450     *  @param  key The key for the message.
451     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
452     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
453     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
454     *  @return The text.
455     */
456    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0", consumers = "retrieveMessage()" )
457    private static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String key, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
458    {
459        final var message = retrieveText( bundle, key, args );
460        final var retValue = addKey
461             ? format( "[%s] %s", key, message )
462             : message;
463
464        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
465        return retValue;
466    }   //  retrieveMessage()
467
468    /**
469     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the text with the given key from the given
470     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
471     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a text for the given key,
472     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
473     *
474     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
475     *  @param  key The key for the text.
476     *  @param  args    The arguments for the text.
477     *  @return The text.
478     *
479     *  @see Objects#toString(Object)
480     */
481    public static final String retrieveText( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String key, final Object... args )
482    {
483        requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" );
484        String retValue;
485        try
486        {
487            final var format = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).getString( requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" ) );
488            retValue = format( format, args ).translateEscapes();
489        }
490        catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final MissingResourceException e )
491        {
492            retValue = createFallback( key, args );
493        }
494
495        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
496        return retValue;
497    }   //  retrieveText()
498
499    /**
500     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the text for the given {@code enum} value from
501     *  the given resource bundle.}</p>
502     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a text for the {@code enum},
503     *  the text key for it will be returned.</p>
504     *
505     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
506     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
507     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
508     *  @return The text.
509     */
510    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String retrieveText( final ResourceBundle bundle, final E value )
511    {
512        final var retValue = retrieveText( bundle, composeTextKey( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) ) );
513
514        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
515        return retValue;
516    }   //  retrieveText()
517}
518//  class I18nUtil
519
520/*
521 *  End of File
522 */
